content.en: PUF Security: Algorithms are being used to address various research questions related to the security of physically unclonable functions (PUFs). These algorithms are employed to analyze threats to PUF security, propose new architectures, and develop attacks against PUFs. They are also used to enhance the security of PUFs against modeling attacks and machine learning attacks. Overall, algorithms play a crucial role in improving the resilience and effectiveness of PUFs in protecting sensitive information in applications such as IoT security.
content.da: PUF-sikkerhed: Algoritmer bliver brugt til at besvare forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til sikkerheden af fysisk uklonbare funktioner (PUF'er). Disse algoritmer anvendes til at analysere trusler mod PUF-sikkerhed, foreslå nye arkitekturer og udvikle angreb mod PUF'er. De bruges også til at forbedre PUF'ers sikkerhed mod modelleringsangreb og maskinlæringsangreb. Overordnet spiller algoritmer en afgørende rolle i at forbedre PUF'ers modstandsdygtighed og effektivitet i beskyttelsen af følsomme informationer i applikationer som IoT-sikkerhed.
